snippet.title: Official Trailer: Deus Ex Machina 2
snippet.description:
Deus Ex Machina 2, the latest trailer of Mel Croucher's reimagination of the world's first interactive movie. Starring Christopher Lee, Ian Dury, Joaquim de Almeida, Chyna Whyne, Chris Madin.

Find us on Kickstarter: http://kck.st/12eBJbk
Find out more: http://www.deusexmachina2.com/
